annotations.title=주석 annotations.menu.loading=주석설정 로딩 annotations.menu.loaderror=실패: annotations.tab.info.noannotations=이 페이지에 주석 없음
annotations.settings.display=주석 보기 annotations.settings.error.wrongsyntax=XWiki/1.0 에서 주석 사용 불가. annotations.settings.error.notarget=주석 설정을 가져올 페이지가 지정되지 않았습니다.
annotations.annotated.loading=주석 페이지 로딩 annotations.annotated.loaderror=실패: annotations.annotated.loaderror.wrongresponse=형식이 잘못된 서버 응답 annotations.annotated.error.noannotatedelement=내용을 사용할 수 없기 때문에 주석을 로드할 수 없습니다. annotations.annotated.error.wrongsyntax=XWiki/1.0 구문으로 작성된 페이지에는 주석을 사용할 수 없습니다.

### Missing: annotations.config.title=Annotations configuration panel ### Missing: annotations.config.display.title=Annotation display ### Missing: annotations.config.type.title=Annotation type ### Missing: annotations.config.activate.title=Annotation activation ### Missing: annotations.config.activate.explanation=The following two settings allow you to configure which locations annotations are active in. The first setting specifies the general rule, while the second list specifies the locations for which the rule shouldn't apply. For example, activated "yes" and exception locations "XWiki" and "Main" means that annotations will be active on all locations except for "XWiki" and "Main". As an opposite example, using activated "no" and exception locations "Documents" means that annotations will be active only for the "Documents" location. ### Missing: annotations.config.type.explanation=Add properties to this class if you want extra properties for your annotations. ### Missing: admin.annotations=Annotations ### Missing: admin.annotations.description=Configure the page annotations
### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_activated=Annotations are activated ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_activated.hint=Decide if annotations are active on the wiki ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_exceptionSpaces=Except for the following locations ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_exceptionSpaces.hint=Deactivate annotations for the following subset of locations: ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_displayed=Display annotations by default ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_displayed.hint=Decide if annotations are displayed by default or only when "Show annotations" is checked on each page ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_displayHighlight=Highlight annotations by default ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_displayHighlight.hint=Decide if highlighting of an annotation should be displayed always or only when hovering over an annotation or a structure of annotations ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_annotationClass=XWiki class defining annotations structure
